name: World Tree
description: The World Tree, source of all life and magic,
has begun to wither and lose its divine power.
Journey to the heart of creation itself and
restore the eternal tree that sustains all existence.

objectives.commune_with_tree_spirit: Commune with the World Tree Spirit

dialogs.start1: The source of all life grows weak, champion.
dialogs.start2: Without the World Tree, all existence will fade.
dialogs.start3: You must journey to the very heart of creation.
dialogs.progress1: Life force flows stronger through the ancient roots.
dialogs.progress2: The World Tree recognizes your pure intentions.
dialogs.complete1: The World Tree blooms with renewed vitality!
dialogs.complete2: Life itself owes you a debt that can never be repaid.
